li.label: germaphobe
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.

li.label: hygienic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.

li.label: unhygienic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.

li.label: slob
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
